meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>long</kanji> <kanji>shamisen song</kanji> is a <vocabulary>long shamisen song</vocabulary>! They're also called <vocabulary>nagauta</vocabulary>, and they're usually pretty epic too.
readingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You learned them when you learned the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
